titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (S. 627) to establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-187, by Mr. Dreier.
The resolution provides that upon adoption of the resolution the amendment printed in the report from the Committee on Rules shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 64.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 383.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 187 (Roll no. 675).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/29/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 627 (establishing the Commission on Freedom of Information Act).
